Need an account? Get one here >

We were unable to retrieve twitter data at this time. Please check your network connection and then press the refresh button to try again.

Centogram specializes in content-managed mobile apps where we pride ourselves in delivering thoughtful strategy and design to all screens - atop desks and in hands. We deliver solutions to Fortune 500 companies across the nation, and we work hard to exceed their very high expectations of us.

Mike Zitt Inc creates brand experiences that grow businesses. We are focused on making complex messages simple, with a passion and proven understanding of the mobile landscape. We can start from the beginning of a project or anywhere in the development cycle to deliver with excellence.

This application was built with Appcelerator, the number one platform for cloud service-enabled mobile applications. Application logic was developed using Alloy, a component-oriented client side MVC framework for Titanium that provides declarative markup for native UI, separation of concerns, and a predictable project structure for Titanium applications.
The back end for this app is implemented using Drupal which enables a feature-rich back end to manage the content.
This application is open source under the Apache 2.0 License, and is available for download at http://bit.ly/dnc-src

You can create your personal Schedule by clicking on the star icon in the Schedule Tab next to each session you wish to attend. The star will turn blue and a link to the Session will be created here for your personal schedule. That's it!.
